name: Autumn Critter
description:
I wouldn't suggest playing this game. But if you do the objective is to get to the other side of the Cabin through the exit near the top Corner of the Room. Don't fall!

During the Jam I experimented with Blender modelling, sculpting and animations and wanted to try out importing them in Unity. That worked and I am very happy with this initial tryout of the functions. They can be seen on the spider. 

Designing the Room was fun but I didn't get a chance to make the textures, or add a slew of miscellaneous objects yet. 

And the game mechanics are lackluster to say the least. I have some very good ideas to refine them to allow the creature to properly crawl pretty much anywhere it wants.  

I do plan on working on the game and adding proper functionality to it, as well as fixing the bumpiness. This will be in the upcoming weeks. 

WASD to move, Space to Jump, R to reset position in case you flip and Escape to Quit. 

If you did try it out, many thanks!

If you actually managed to get to the end, well then, that deserves some congratulations as I know it would be quite difficult, at the moment.
